meanings.definition: A waterproof fabric coated with oil.
meanings.sent1: The picnic blanket was made of oilcloth to keep it dry.
meanings.sent2: She spread the oilcloth on the table before setting the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The raincoat made of oilcloth made him look like a walking oil painting.
meanings.sent4: The oilcloth shielded the table from spills like a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: The oilcloth glistened in the sunlight, repelling any water that dared to touch it.

meanings.definition: A tablecloth made of oilcloth material.
meanings.sent1: The oilcloth on the dining table was easy to wipe clean after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new oilcloth to match the kitchen decor.
meanings.sent3: The oilcloth on the table felt like a magic carpet under their plates.
meanings.sent4: The oilcloth transformed the table into a vibrant canvas of colors.
meanings.sent5: The oilcloth added a touch of elegance to the simple wooden table.
